Remove objects from a map

mapRm.Rd

Remove objects from a map

mapRm(map, layer, ask = TRUE, ...)

# S3 method for class 'map'
mapRm(map, layer = NULL, ask = TRUE, ...)

See also

Other mapMethods: crs,map-method, rasterToMatch,map-method, rasters(), studyArea(), studyAreaName()

Examples

if (require("SpaDES.tools", quietly = TRUE)) {
  p <- terra::vect(cbind(-120, 60), crs = "epsg:4326") |>
    SpaDES.tools::randomPolygon(area = 1e5) |>
    sf::st_as_sf() |>
    sf::as_Spatial()
  m <- mapAdd(p, layerName = "p")
  m

  m <- mapRm(m, "p")
  m
}
#> The CRS provided is not in meters; converting internally to UTM so area will be approximately correct.
#> No cachePath supplied and getOption('reproducible.cachePath') is inside a temporary directory;
#>   this will not persist across R sessions.
#> Saved! Cache file: 2608bbefef051b38.rds; fn: fixErrors
#> There is no studyArea in map; consider adding one with 'isStudyArea = TRUE'
#> No crs already in map, so no reprojection
#> Empty data.table (0 rows and 11 cols): layerName,layerType,columnNameForLabels,leaflet,studyArea,rasterToMatch...
